error.message: Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\entity_comparison\Controller\EntityComparisonController::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_render(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function entity_get_display(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use EntityDisplayRepositoryInterface::getViewDisplay() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\UrlGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\entity_comparison\EntityComparisonPermissions. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\entity_comparison\Form\EntityComparisonForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.

Class Drupal\entity_comparison\Tests\EntityComparisonTest extends deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.

Call to method setUp() of deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.
Call to deprecated function entity_get_form_display(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use EntityDisplayRepositoryInterface::getFormDisplay() instead.
Call to deprecated function entity_get_display(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use EntityDisplayRepositoryInterface::getViewDisplay() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to entity_comparison.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
